title: Sen. Michael Bennet | Alabama’s Abortion Ban; Trump’s War on Congress: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the president arguing in court that Congress can’t investigate him as Republicans wage a war on reproductive rights.

Then, Michael Bennet talks about his run for president. He takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
